name: 模拟驾考二
description:
A game that simulates driving,
"Simulation driving II is also called automobile driving simulation, or virtual automobile driving. Simulation driving allows the experimenter to drive in a virtual driving environment,
Make them feel the visual, auditory and somatosensory car driving experience close to the real effect. The driving simulation effect is lifelike, energy-saving, safe and economical, and is not limited by time, climate and site,
The advantages of high driving training efficiency and short training cycle are widely used in new model development and driving training. "
